dct_title_s: Jerusalem die heilige viereckete Stadt, in Grund gelegt und eigentlich abgemalet [Verso]
dct_description_sm: Woodcut. Bird's-eye view of Jerusalem; relief shown pictorially. German text on verso with caption title: Jerusalem; p. 25, 28. From: Bünting, Heinrich. Itinerarium Sacrae Scripturae. Helmstadt : Jacobus Lucius, 1582. Part I, p. 26-27. Second edition. First edition published in 1581. An imaginary plan. Historic Maps copy accompanied by certificate of guarantee signed by Roger P. Schupack, Purveyor of Antique Maps, Engravings and Prints.
